cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on September 20, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6630, Legislation to Name United States Post Offices

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 24 (Monday, February 7, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. KIM of California:
H.R. 6630.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States.
[Page H1013]
title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1400 N Kraemer Blvd. in Placentia, California, as the "PFC Jang Ho Kim Post Office Building".
